The Walking Dead tells the story of the consequence of a zombie apocalypse; follows a small group of survivors, traveling down a desolate United States in search of a new home away from the hordes of undead. The group is led by Rick Grimes, who was the sheriff of police of a small town in Georgia, before the zombie outbreak. As their situation grows more hazardous, the group's desperation to survive leads them to the brink of insanity.
